short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Patsa is a real-time AI copilot for meetings that will make you a know-it-all during an online meeting. Get AI answers instantly.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Launch the Patsa extension during a Google Meet/Zoom/Teams meeting. Transcribe other participants' speech and receive additional information and answers to questions from AI in real time.
How it works:
1) Launch the Patsa extension during any online meeting in Chrome.
2) Click the “Start Transcription” button. The speech of other meeting participants will then be transcribed.
3) Select the transcribed text you want to ask the AI to answer and you will receive information from the AI instantly.
Good luck at the meeting!
